/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of being immersed in the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. On either side of the street, traditional Chinese buildings stand tall, their architectural details adding a touch of history and culture to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall mood of the image is peaceful and serene, inviting the viewer to take a moment and soak in the beauty of the scene.
